 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶאֱלִים‎</span> **noun masculine plural** ==a kind of lotus== (***Rhamnus*** (more exactly ***Zizyphus***), ***Lotus*** [[[BDB#Linn|Linn]].], ***thorny lotus*** (not sacred ***Nymphea Lotus***; [[BDB#Saad|Saad]] <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#AW|AW]] [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>[[Job.2|Job 2]]</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, see [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>p. 275</sup>); — [[Job.40.21|Job 40:21]]; [[Job.40.22|Job 40:22]].
